title: Locksmith at the End of the World
description: Locksmith at the End of the World: A Dead Silence NovellaPart OneChester, Lucy, and Emma find themselves alone navigating a changed world where silence is not golden, but deadly. Chester's life has been wonderful since his person rescued him from the animal shelter, but in one heart-stopping moment his world turns savage and silent.Lucy, a locksmith in the Before, uses her skills to stay quiet and unseen as she travels from town to town, searching in the silence.Emma's refuge becomes a deathtrap, forcing her to learn survival on the fly in a strange, silent world.Will they survive the silence?
author: Angela D. Glascock
